name: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Fiery Core
tooltip:
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Fiery CoreLevel 60

Woe unto those that tempt fate inside the Molten Core. Death comes swiftly - the punishment dealt without mercy.

Many of the Brotherhood have been lost in their search for Fiery Cores.

Offer 1 Fiery Core and you shall be granted favor amongst the Brotherhood.

Requirements:
- Fiery Core
